import React from 'react' import "./Rightstyle.css" import Calender from './Calender' function RightSection() { const [isMarkerVisible, setIsMarkerVisible] = setIsMarkerVisible(false); const handleButtonClick = () => { setIsMarkerVisible(!isMarkerVisible); // Toggle marker visibility document.body.classList.toggle('blur'); // Toggle background blur on body } return (
Leave Management
) } export default RightSection
